Regulation Name(s): System, multipurpose for in vitro coagulation studies
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Infrared light detection of clot formation
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Immedia Prothrombin Time System for quantitative measurement of prothrombin time (PT) and INR in fresh capillary whole blood using test strips and a dedicated meter
Indications for Use Summary: Provides quantitative prothrombin time and INR results in fresh capillary whole blood to monitor patients receiving warfarin-type anticoagulation therapy at the point of care; not intended for screening purposes
